short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds extra UI functionality to fitnesse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions adds improvements for the day to day use of Fitnesse.

It only run's on localhost and only on a fitnesse page.

It provides some shortcuts to speed up editing of pages.
'e' on any page to go to edit mode.
'ctrl + s' on an edit mode to save a page
When saving a page it automatically formats contents.
Can now clone a page via the tools menu.

(beta) You can now use 'ctrl + shift + f' to open a sidebar which allows you to search your custom fixtures (via doxygen documentation files). (see options for more info on setting this up).
